title: 5 Best Breakout Stocks To Buy Right Now
text: Number of Hedge Fund Investors In Q4 2023: 173 NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ:NVDA) is the best known and most valuable semiconductor company in the world due to its GPUs. The firm had a unique product announcement in store for February 2024, when it revealed an A.I. chat bot for its users powered by its products. After sifting through 933 hedge fund portfolios, Insider Monkey discovered 173 NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ:NVDA) investors as of Q4 2023 end. Rajiv Jain’s GQG Partners owned the biggest stake which was worth $6.8 billion. Disclosure: None. You can also take a look at Warren Buffett and Billionaires Are Crazy About These 15 Stocks and Ken Griffin’s Wellington Fund Delivers Mind-Numbing Returns: Here are Its Top 15 Stocks.
